txt.en: 'The Uruk's words about an assault on Echad Mirobel worry me [placeholder]. Echad Mirobel does not have enough strength to resist an assault from even a part of Saruman's forces.\n\n'We must warn Echad Mirobel that the White Hand is preparing to move against them. Travel west of Echad Dúnann along the Nan Sirannon road to Echad Mirobel and speak with Ornras. Let him know of the danger he now faces.'
'The White Hand prepares a force against Echad Mirobel?\n\n'You bear ill news, but perhaps we have some time left to fortify our defences.'
'Echad Mirobel is west of Echad Dúnann, along the Nan Sirannon road.'
'The White Hand must be stopped at all costs!'
Glavroleth is concerned that the White Hand is preparing an assault on Echad Mirobel.
Talk to Ornras at Echad Mirobel
Echad Mirobel is west of Echad Dúnann, along the Nan Sirannon road.\n\nYou have been instructed to warn Echad Mirobel of the White Hand threat.
